about_the_game:
In this prologue, you can experience the beginning of "The Romantic of Righteousness: San Guo".

※ There is no saving function in this special version of the preface. Players can select three levels contained in the preface repeatedly on the main menu.

※ About language: In order to increase the sense of the atmosphere of ancient games and the need of the story of the game, the beta version uses the traditional Official script commonly used in The Three Kingdoms period as the default language.
and I'm so apology that I have no extra ability to develop the English version.

※ There are some differences between this version and the official version.

Experience the world after the Red Cliff War of The Three Kingdoms.


二龙争战决雌雄,赤壁楼船扫地空。
烈火张天照云海,周瑜于此破曹公。
——李白[唐]《赤壁歌送别》

Poetry's sense of honor

The two dragons fought and fought,
There were so many buildings and ships on the Red Cliff that there was no land to stand on,
The sky is red with fire,
It was here that Zhou Yu defeated Cao Cao!
——liBai《Red Cliff song farewell 》

In 208 AD, JianAn 13 years, eight hundred thousand soldiers with fifty thousand troops of the Sun Quan & Liu Bei allied troops fighting on the red cliff, due to poor northern Cao Cao army troops maneuver CaoCao army will ship with iron chain links, while Cao Cao mistook the combat, the invincible, coalition forces in the Zhuge Liang is bright night astrologers deduction, with the aid of east wind use fire siege jun existing ship the array, Under Zhou Yu's command, cao's army was defeated by a large number of troops.



The battle of Chibi ended in flames above the ships and blood below, with countless soldiers sinking into the Yangtze River, which is nothing more than a purgatory on earth.


And this is an end, but also a beginning.

Main game features in the prologue:

Three Kingdoms background theme horizontal version ARPG

Growing up as an assassin during the Three Kingdoms era, "The Romantic of Righteousness: SanGuo Prologue" adds an option for those who love Three Kingdoms games!

Three playable levels

From Chibi Trail to CaoCao's flagship, players can challenge any level according to their preferences.
The level includes 3 types of enemies and 2 types of bosses.

Chinese Traditional Comic-book-like 2.5D screen


The picture of "The Romantic of Righteousness: San Guo" is inspired by The Chinese Traditional comic strip. In order to reflect the "live" Chinese Traditional comic strip picture, the hand-drawn character design is meticulous, and the action binding is closer to the effect of the shadow puppet show, just to restore the Chinese charm.

Treasure System


As the game progresses, players gain more treasures, improve their abilities, solve puzzles, and reach previously inaccessible locations.

(The prologue game can only unlock one power boost item, the official version will improve this function, get more treasure to improve the game experience)

Multi-action operation

With long whips, mini crossbows, shooting ropes and attacking enemies with drops, there is more than one way to turn the danger into a disaster.
Pushing boxes, swinging ropes, and moving forward in more than one way.
(The above is the prologue to the player's operability, and there will be more features in the official version.)

As an independent developer, I will continue to improve the game and ensure the official release of "The Romantic of Righteousness: San Guo". This is a beginning, not an end!

Thank you for your support!

content_descriptors.notes: In order to show the cruelty of war, this game has cartoon amputation, bleeding, and other effects.
